ranked_diseases.explanation: This condition is known to be associated with febrile seizures and has been frequently observed in similar reference cases.
Although mostly observed with additional neurodevelopmental abnormalities, this condition is still relevant due to the presentation of febrile seizures in the history.
This condition is strongly associated with febrile seizures fitting the age criteria given and is a primary consideration when only febrile seizures are reported.
Similar to familial type 1, this disease is recognized for febrile seizures and is relevant based solely on the reported phenotypic feature.
